document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9c88ff">World </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9c88ff">made </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9c88ff">penniless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9c88ff">departure </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9c88ff">minor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">systems </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9c88ff">begs, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">Firmaments </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">fellows </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">stars </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9c88ff">Dregs </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A world made penniless by his departure
